content: this legal document is about a divorce case between mr a and mrs b they have agreed to a mutual consent divorce and have reached a settlement they got married in south africa in 2014 under belgian law without a marriage contract they have a minor child together the document outlines their rights and arrangements they will retain their own financial assets and accounts they will each keep the movable property currently in their possession they have assigned specific cars to each party and they will be responsible for the expenses related to their respective cars they jointly own a house which will be sold any inheritances gifts or bequests received by either spouse will remain their own property each spouse will keep their own income and future debts they have agreed on the division of certain debts the document also addresses parental authority visitation schedule child registration child benefit and taxation it includes provisions for the contribution to the childs expenses and mentions the possibility of wage authorization and involvement of the service maintenance claims in case of nonpayment the document also covers the maintenance of the spouses resignation of compulsory registration costs of the proceedings and the place of jurisdiction both parties declare their understanding and agreement to the terms of the document
